languages.text: "Не желаете ли присутствовать при установке алтаря и хранилища стяга, Ваша Светлость? Вы будете перв{mf|ым|ой}, кто преклонит колени перед реликвией и подаст пример благочестия всему экипажу".

traits.locale_text: "Не желаете ли присутствовать при установке алтаря и хранилища стяга, Ваша Светлость? Вы будете перв{mf|ым|ой}, кто преклонит колени перед реликвией и подаст пример благочестия всему экипажу".

languages.text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."
languages.original_text: "Не желаете ли присутствовать при установке алтаря и хранилища стяга, Ваша Светлость? Вы будете перв{mf|ым|ой}, кто преклонит колени перед реликвией и подаст пример благочестия всему экипажу".

traits.locale_text: "Would you like to witness the installation of the altar and the pedestal of the banner, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You will be the first to kneel before the relic and show the example of righteousness to the entire crew."

"Would you like to witness the installation of the altar and the pedestal of the banner, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You will be the first to kneel before the relic and show the example of righteousness to the entire crew."
"Would you like to witness the installation of the altar and banner, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You will be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of righteousness."
"Would you like to witness the installation of the altar and banner, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? You will be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of righteousness."
"Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

languages.text: “您愿意见证祭坛与旗帜的安装过程吗，大人？您会成为第一个跪在圣物前祈祷的人，所有船员都会将您视为正义的典范。”
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

traits.locale_text: “您愿意见证祭坛与旗帜的安装过程吗，大人？您会成为第一个跪在圣物前祈祷的人，所有船员都会将您视为正义的典范。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie souhaite-t-elle assister à l'installation de l'autel et de la bannière ? Vous pourriez être {mf|le premier|la première} à vous agenouiller devant la relique, et donner ainsi un bel exemple de piété à l'ensemble de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie souhaite-t-elle assister à l'installation de l'autel et de la bannière ? Vous pourriez être {mf|le premier|la première} à vous agenouiller devant la relique, et donner ainsi un bel exemple de piété à l'ensemble de l'équipage. »

languages.text: 「祭壇と旗印の設営をご覧になりますか、陛下？最初に遺宝の前に跪き、艦の乗員に範たる敬虔をお示し下さい」
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「祭壇と旗印の設営をご覧になりますか、陛下？最初に遺宝の前に跪き、艦の乗員に範たる敬虔をお示し下さい」

languages.text: «¿Le gustaría presenciar la instalación del altar y el estandarte, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Así podrá ser {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en arrodillarse ante la reliquia, sentando un ejemplo de piedad para la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le gustaría presenciar la instalación del altar y el estandarte, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Así podrá ser {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en arrodillarse ante la reliquia, sentando un ejemplo de piedad para la tripulación».

languages.text: "Möchten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} miterleben, wie der Altar und das Banner installiert werden? Ihr würdet als {mf|Erster|Erste} überhaupt vor dem Relikt niederknien und der Crew ein gutes Vorbild der Frömmigkeit sein."
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Möchten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} miterleben, wie der Altar und das Banner installiert werden? Ihr würdet als {mf|Erster|Erste} überhaupt vor dem Relikt niederknien und der Crew ein gutes Vorbild der Frömmigkeit sein."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sunak ile sancağın yerleştirilişini görmek ister mi? Yadigâr önünde ilk diz çöken olabilir ve inancınızla mürettebatınıza örnek olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to witness the installation of the altar and banner? You would be the first to kneel before the relic and set the example of piety for the crew."
